alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Walker; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 8:21PM CDT until June 21 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN GRIMES...MONTGOMERY...NORTHEASTERN WALLER AND SOUTHWESTERN WALKER COUNTIES... At 819 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over western Conroe, moving southeast at 55 mph. There have been no reports of strong damaging winds yet with this warning, but wind gusts to 60 mph are still possible. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Conroe, western Huntsville, Willis, Pinehurst, The Woodlands, Panorama Village, Shenandoah, Magnolia, Cut And Shoot, New Waverly, Montgomery, Anderson, Woodloch, Todd Mission, Huntsville State Park, Lake Conroe Dam, Crabbs Prairie, Dobbin, Dacus and Plantersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
